title: Designing Electronic Collaboration Environments for Complex Learning: Project-Based Learning Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A blended learning course combining individual and collaborative learning in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners perform peer evaluations using mobile-based collaboration tools (KakaoTalk channels/Google Drive mobile version) when designing complex social studies projects
Learners produce instructional materials using smartphone-accessible digital resources (podcasts, infographics) following a four-stage PBL model (problem definition-planning-execution-reflection)
Learners achieve an 80%+ task completion rate by applying time management and role allocation strategies during mobile team-based learning activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
